communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I'm a waitress at a bustling Houston club, always on my feet. In my downtime, I jog to keep fit and give blood monthly in memory of my sister. My life's about to change big time; I'm moving to Australia to marry my boyfriend. It's exciting but also a bit scary, leaving everything behind.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm all about discipline and control, especially when it comes to my body. I share tips on fasting and calorie restriction, framing them as hacks to master your body. No medical jargon here, just real talk on how to take charge of your life through what you eat—or don't eat.
